Articles.Content:
Whenever I try to launch a space plane, I get a strange atmospheric view and the game crashes.

Sometimes I can't even load a spaceplane file because it appears with half the parts missing. I can't figure out what mod or combinations could be causing it. All my mods are as current as possible.

I'm Using:

B9 Aerospace 5.2.8

Chatterer 0.8.1

Crew Manifest 0.5.10.0

Deadly Reentry 6.4.0

Distant Object Enhancement 1.5.1

EVE 7.4

Umbral Industries Explorer pack 0.3.1

FAR 0.14.6

Hot Rockets 7.25

Kerbal Alarm Clock 3.2.3.0

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement 3.1.1

KSP AVC 1.1.5.0

Interstellar 0.13

KW Rocketry 2.6

Infernal Robotics 0.19.3

MechJeb 2-2.4.2.0

MechJeb FAR Extensions

Module Manager 2.5.9

PlanetShine 0.2.2.1

Procedural Wings 0.9.3

Procedural Fairings 3.11

RealChute 1.2.6.3

Remote Tech 1.6.3

Science Funding 1.0

Umbral Industries Survival Pack 0.2.1

TACLife Support 0.10.2.15

TechManager 1.5

Texture Replacer 2.2.5

Toolbar 1.7.8

TweakScale 1.50

Vessel View Complete

Active Texture Manager Basic

Astronomers Visual pack Interstellar V2 (though only a few effects, I don't like them all and it's also a memory hog)

I know it's a lot but it runs well except for the space plane problem.

- - - Updated - - -

I forgot to mention, I'm running the 32 bit version of KSP

- - - Updated - - -

Unfortunately, this bug also does not generate a report, it simply freezes the program.
